name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnologyNfcB
summary: Provides access to NFC-B (ISO 14443-3B) properties and I/O operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

methods.name: getApplicationData
methods.summary: Return the Application Data bytes from ATQB/SENSB_RES at tag discovery.

methods.name: getMaxTransceiveLength
methods.summary: Return the maximum number of bytes that can be sent with transceive.

methods.name: getProtocolInfo
methods.summary: Return the Protocol Info bytes from ATQB/SENSB_RES at tag discovery.

methods.name: transceive
methods.summary: Send raw NFC-B commands to the tag and receive the response.
